ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I have the ability to overcome stress.
Notes: 0="Not at all true"; 1="Rarely true"; 2="Sometimes true"; 3="Usually true"; 4="Always true for me"

ElementDescription: I perceive stress as threatening
Notes: 0="Not at all true"; 1="Rarely true"; 2="Sometimes true"; 3="Usually true"; 4="Always true for me"

ElementDescription: There is someone I can turn to for help
Notes: 0="Not at all true"; 1="Rarely true"; 2="Sometimes true"; 3="Usually true"; 4="Always true for me"

ElementDescription: I can positively attack stressors
Notes: 0="Not at all true"; 1="Rarely true"; 2="Sometimes true"; 3="Usually true"; 4="Always true for me"

ElementDescription: I have what it takes to beat stress
Notes: 0="Not at all true"; 1="Rarely true"; 2="Sometimes true"; 3="Usually true"; 4="Always true for me"

ElementDescription: I feel anxious
Notes: 0="Not at all true"; 1="Rarely true"; 2="Sometimes true"; 3="Usually true"; 4="Always true for me"

ElementDescription: Stressful events impact me greatly
Notes: 0="Not at all true"; 1="Rarely true"; 2="Sometimes true"; 3="Usually true"; 4="Always true for me"

ElementDescription: There is help available to me
Notes: 0="Not at all true"; 1="Rarely true"; 2="Sometimes true"; 3="Usually true"; 4="Always true for me"

ElementDescription: The outcome of stressful events is negative
Notes: 0="Not at all true"; 1="Rarely true"; 2="Sometimes true"; 3="Usually true"; 4="Always true for me"

ElementDescription: The event has serious implications for my life
Notes: 0="Not at all true"; 1="Rarely true"; 2="Sometimes true"; 3="Usually true"; 4="Always true for me"

ElementDescription: I have the resources available to overcome stress
Notes: 0="Not at all true"; 1="Rarely true"; 2="Sometimes true"; 3="Usually true"; 4="Always true for me"

ElementDescription: I have the skills necessary to overcome stress
Notes: 0="Not at all true"; 1="Rarely true"; 2="Sometimes true"; 3="Usually true"; 4="Always true for me"

ElementDescription: Stress has a negative impact on me
Notes: 0="Not at all true"; 1="Rarely true"; 2="Sometimes true"; 3="Usually true"; 4="Always true for me"

ElementDescription: There are long-term consequences as the result of stress
Notes: 0="Not at all true"; 1="Rarely true"; 2="Sometimes true"; 3="Usually true"; 4="Always true for me"

ElementDescription: SAMA - Challenges
SAMA - Threat
